title: Why is the new patch taking so long?
body: Am honestly irritated now and really can't wait any longer on this update to install. Its been more than 2 hours since I've been waiting for 'Applying Patches'.....

replies.body: and if it takes any longer am uninstalling

I uninstalled client and am trying to see if that will help (same problems as you... mine was stuck at 33%)

I first tried a lot of the support suggestions - deleting various files/folders with no luck. So I'll let you know how uninstalling/reinstalling goes. Right now I'm at 6%
ok  man, just let me know, because its quite nerve wrecking to be waiting for hours
Mine is still patching but its passed 33% now, I'm at 44% currently. I'm going to flip if it get stuck at 99%.

SUCCESS!

Took about 2.5 hours but it worked. Good luck man.
